      • ContainerShop

        public ContainerShop​(@NotNull
                     @NotNull org.bukkit.Location loc,
                     double price,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull ShopModerator moderator,
                     boolean unlimited,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull ShopType type)
        Adds a new shop.
        Parameters:
        loc - The location of the chest block
        price - The cost per item
        item - The itemstack with the properties we want. This is .cloned, no need to worry about references
        moderator - The modertators
        type - The shop type
        unlimited - The unlimited

      • clone

        @NotNull
public @NotNull ContainerShop clone()
        Returns a clone of this shop. References to the same display item, itemstack, location and owner as this shop does. Do not modify them or you will modify this shop.

        **NOT A DEEP CLONE**

        Specified by:
        clone in interface Shop
        Overrides:
